syllabus_metadata.title: ISTQB Certified Tester Advanced Level - Test Automation Engineer
syllabus_metadata.target_audience: Test professionals working with test automation

chapters.title: Introduction to Test Automation
learning_objectives: ALTA-E-1.1.1 (K2) Explain the objectives, advantages, disadvantages and limitations of test automation
ALTA-E-1.2.1 (K2) Identify technical success factors of a test automation project
key_topics: Advantages and disadvantages of test automation

chapters.title: Preparing for Test Automation
learning_objectives: ALTA-E-2.1.1 (K4) Analyze a system under test to determine the appropriate automation solution
ALTA-E-2.2.1 (K4) Analyze test automation tools for a given project and report technical findings
ALTA-E-2.3.1 (K2) Understand design for testability and automation methods

chapters.title: The Generic Test Automation Architecture
learning_objectives: ALTA-E-3.1.1 (K2) Explain the structure of the gTAA
ALTA-E-3.2.1 (K4) Design the appropriate TAA for a given project
ALTA-E-3.2.2 (K2) Explain the role that layers play within a TAA

chapters.title: Deployment Risks and Contingencies
learning_objectives: ALTA-E-4.1.1 (K3) Apply guidelines for effective test tool pilot and deployment
ALTA-E-4.2.1 (K4) Analyze deployment risks and identify technical issues
ALTA-E-4.3.1 (K2) Understand factors affecting TAS maintainability

chapters.title: Test Automation Reporting and Metrics
learning_objectives: ALTA-E-5.1.1 (K2) Classify metrics for monitoring test automation strategy
ALTA-E-5.2.1 (K3) Implement metrics collection methods
ALTA-E-5.3.1 (K4) Analyze test logging of TAS and SUT data

chapters.title: Transitioning Manual Testing to Automated Environment
learning_objectives: ALTA-E-6.1.1 (K3) Apply criteria for determining test automation suitability
ALTA-E-6.2.1 (K2) Explain factors for implementing automated regression testing
ALTA-E-6.3.1 (K2) Explain automation within new feature testing

chapters.title: Verifying the TAS
learning_objectives: ALTA-E-7.1.1 (K3) Verify automated test environment correctness
ALTA-E-7.2.1 (K3) Verify correct behavior of automated test scripts

chapters.title: Continuous Improvement
learning_objectives: ALTA-E-8.1.1 (K4) Analyze deployed automation solutions for improvement
ALTA-E-8.2.1 (K4) Analyze testware for consolidation and updates

study_resources.title: Test Automation in the Real World

practical_exercises.title: Tool Evaluation Workshop
practical_exercises.description: Evaluate automation tools for a project scenario
